topic.title: Ocular Physical Exam Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to IHE Physical Exam Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.9.15)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="70948-5" Ocular physical exam (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Routine Eye Exam Section (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.12.1.2.6)
